entries.description: Amazon Q /doc: Improve button text phrasing
Amazon Q /dev: Fix issue when files are deleted while preparing context
Amazon Q Code Transformation: allow POSTGRESQL as target DB for SQL conversions
Fix context menu displaying when typing @, even though input is disallowed
Amazon Q can update mvn and gradle build files
/transform: use correct documentation link in SQL conversion help message
Up/down history navigation only triggering on first/last line of prompt input
Amazon Q /test: Fix to redirect /test to generate tests in chat for external files out of workspace scope.
/review: Code block extends beyond page margins in code issue detail view
Amazon Q Code Transformation: retry project upload up to 3 times
Amazon Q Code Transformation: add view summary button in chat
Amazon Q: new code syntax highlighter for improved accuracy
Settings: No longer migrate old CodeWhisperer settings or initialize telemetry setting from AWS Toolkit.
